EmailTemplate.subject: Blog: the teenager’s effect on broadband
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Blog: the teenager’s effect on broadband Predicting bandwidth demand As populations grow and age, understanding digital natives’ multitasking and unicast video habits is crucial for planning broadband network investments.
Nokia’s new bandwidth modeling tool helps you calculate how much bandwidth your network will need as demand grows and consumption patterns change. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Karaportti 3, 02610 Espoo, Finland Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia’s networks business or its third-party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
